title: Jack socket for a portable electronic device
abstract: The present disclosure provides a two-part jack socket for a portable electronic device and a portable electronic device having the same. In accordance with one example embodiment, the jack socket comprises: a first part having a contact surface; a second part having a contact surface and being moveable with respect to the first part between a first position and a second position, the contact surfaces of the first part and second part defining a cavity, the cavity having a retracted state when the second part is in the first position and an expanded state for receiving a jack plug when the second part is in the second position; and one or more contacts located in the contact surface of the first part or second part.

motivations: There is a need for a compact and versatile jack socket design suitable for portable electronic devices.
objectives: Design a two-part jack socket that can accommodate a jack plug while minimizing space requirements.
Develop a jack socket that can be integrated into a portable electronic device.
methods: Create a jack socket with two moveable parts that define a cavity for receiving a jack plug.
Use a design where the cavity has a retracted state and an expanded state to accommodate the jack plug.
results: Provide a compact and functional jack socket for portable electronic devices.
Enable the efficient use of space in portable electronic devices.
llama_json.research_subject: Design of a two-part jack socket for portable electronic devices

motivations: There is a need for a more flexible and adaptable jack socket design for portable electronic devices.
objectives: Design a two-part jack socket for a portable electronic device that can move between two positions to accommodate different states.
methods: Develop a jack socket with two parts, each having a contact surface, that can move between a retracted state and an expanded state for receiving a jack plug.
Incorporate one or more contacts in the contact surface of the first or second part of the jack socket.
results: A two-part jack socket design that can adapt to different states, enhancing the flexibility and usability of portable electronic devices.
openai_json.research_subject: Design of a two-part jack socket for portable electronic devices

motivations: Portable electronic devices require jack sockets that can accommodate jack plugs while maintaining compact form factors and reliable connections.
objectives: Design a two-part jack socket that can transition between a retracted state for compactness and an expanded state for receiving jack plugs.
methods: Develop a jack socket with a first part and a moveable second part that create an adjustable cavity through their contact surfaces.
Position electrical contacts within the contact surfaces to establish connection with inserted jack plugs.
results: Enable portable electronic devices to have space-efficient jack sockets that expand only when needed to receive jack plugs.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Two-part expandable jack socket design for portable electronic devices
